title: Marlon Vera def. Andre Ewell at UFC on ESPN+ 19: Best photos
text:
Check out the best photos from Marlon Vera’s TKO win over Andre Ewell at UFC on ESPN+ 19 at Amalie Arena in Tampa, Fla. (Photos by Reinhold Matay, USA TODAY Sports)
